column2: a brief introduction to the site and the project as a whole~ as well as information on how to contribute
we cover various braille note takers~ magnifiers~ book readers and any other devices useful for the blind/vi
We talk about different operating systems~ how accessible they are and which one is the best for blind/vi users~ be it mobile~ desktop or even cloud
A page dedicated to software programs on both mobile and desktop and how useful/accessible they are to blind/vi users
A page containing various helpfull programs for blind/vi users
the blind computing blog~ where we ask questions and talk about random projects we're working on
